description: I've been using FreeFileSync for ages, it works perfect for me and my different backup needs. The only down side was the time it took to compile from Arch's AUR every time it had an update, issue that is completely gone with the flatpak version.
This version, 9.8, is the latest in this repo as of 18 Sep 2018, and was released on 6 Feb 2018. 6 minor versions have been released since then with significant improvements.
summary: FreeFileSync is great, but this version is out of date

description:
I've been using FreeFileSync for a long time with no problems at all. Great application for two-way synchronization, fast, and easy to use from novice to advanced users.
My only complaint is that the flatpak version is out of date.
I am getting errors on start and also this is a really old version, 9.8. I think the latest is 10.9, please update.
Extremely useful and easy. It saved me when Dropbox banned the use of symlinks.

For simple backups of your data, this is simple to use and should have all or most of the settings you are looking for.
Never had any problems with it and updates are released quite often. It's also well documented and supported.
Nice interface. Very easy to use.
very useful app for folder and file comparison and sync.
For file/folder comparison and syncing, it does everything you'll need.
the official installer works better, the gui look is consistent and smooth.
summary: Working, but look out dated and leggy on wayland

description: Ich habe FreeFileSync in einer Linuxzeitschrift gefunden, und habe es ausprobiert. Ich habe es über Flatpak installiert, was super einfach ging. Es ist leicht verständlich und macht was es soll schnell und gründlich. Ich bin sehr zufreiden. Ich werde es auf meiner OpenSuse behalten.
Das für mich beste Backup und Sync Programm
Funciona mejor que los de pago. Excelente Utilidad para sincronizar archivos.
Funciona a la perfección, muy interesante para sincronizar todos los archivos de varias computadoras. Mejor que los de pago.
Si buscas hacer copias, sincronizar tus datos en modo espejo o demas opciones esta es la mejor aplicación una joya.
Advanced options made intuitive and easy to use

J'ai testé de nombreux outils de backup, entre complexité et bugs je ne trouvais pas chaussure à mon pied, c'est chose faite avec ce petit programme simple et performant qui accepte de sauvegarder sur serveur distant via ssh (sftp). Top !
